name: Outside the Shell
description:
Help the hatchling turtles survive their first moments outside!

Use the Arrow Keys to avoid enemies and reach the ocean and freedom!

Credits:

All retrieved from opengameart.org

Punch, Slap, N' Kick sounds by CGEffex

Ocean Music Pack by Leonardo Paz
Win Music #2 by remaxim
